text:
Xavier García Albiol (born 8 December 1967) is a Spanish politician. He is a member of the People's Party. From 2015 to 2019, he served as a member of the Parliament of Catalonia. He was mayor of his birthplace, Badalona between 2011 and 2015.
In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, García Albiol tested positive for COVID-19.
